enb_long_title: Third session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Long-term Cooperative Action and first part of the sixth session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex 1 Parties under the Kyoto Protocol to the UNFCCC
sentences: In Bonn, a workshop was held on the topic, with many parties voicing support for continuing the mechanisms after 2012.
In particular, possible changes to the Clean Development Mechanism (CDM) were debated, with some differences over the inclusion of activities such as carbon capture and storage.
Some parties urged a broader scope for CDM activities and simpler rules, while others emphasized the need to ensure environmental integrity.
